abstract: Investors snapped up industrial and materials stocks on Tuesday, helping the Dow soar to a 18-month high. Better-than-expected data on home sales helped renew confidence about the economy, even though investors remained concerned that a recovery for the housing market was stalling.

lead_paragraph: Investors snapped up industrial and materials stocks on Tuesday, helping the Dow soar to a 18-month high.

headline.main: Wall Street Gets a Little Momentum
